fields.comment: String name of material this creates
fields.name: material

fields.comment: Size of the area to cover
fields.name: size

fields.comment: Offset of the center of the area to cover
fields.name: offset

fields.comment: How many pixels to cover per one direction per one frame
fields.name: speed

fields.comment: Parameters for sine wave that affects material spawn pattern
fields.name: sine_wavelength

fields.comment: Parameters for sine wave that affects material spawn pattern
fields.name: sine_amplitude

fields.comment: Parameters for noise that affects material spawn pattern
fields.name: noise_scale

fields.comment: Parameters for noise that affects material spawn pattern
fields.name: noise_threshold
